page.title: 14DIARY OF A MILKMAN.
page.content: I've been{a milkman}for thirteen years.I have to get up at 4 o'clock to load the van from the old store; the milk having been delivered by lorry the previous afternoon.I set off at 5.a.m. in the summer I work seven days a week{delivering to shops,}hotels and houses.When I finish the round at 1.pm I start on my paperwork.In the summer I deliver approximately 1,400 bottles of milk plus fresh cream orange and eggs. I enjoy the job as it's much better than being shut in a factory, but I don't like getting up so early or having to{work during the holidays} like Christmas and Easter. Unfortunately, because of the worry of the fat content in dairy products sales have gone down.However sales of skimmed milk are now on their way up.
